issue.title: [MATLAB] Update featherreadmex and featherwritemex to build against latest arrow c++ APIs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12730](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12730). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The mex functions featherreadmex and featherwritemex currently do not compile if you are using the latest arrow c++ APIs.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12730?focusedCommentId=17369809) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10305
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10305>
